Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
